title: How to Make a Triangle in Photoshop on PC or Mac

methods.name: Making Triangles with the Shape Tool

steps.headline: Open Photoshop.
steps.description: The icon is a blue square with "PS" in the middle.

steps.headline: Click File.
steps.description: It is located in the top-left corner of the window.

steps.headline: Select New and then Ok to start a new canvas.
steps.description: You can also use an old canvas by double-clicking your saved photoshop file.

steps.headline: Select the solid Rectangle button from the menu on the left.
steps.description: It is typically located between the black arrow and the hand icon.

steps.headline: Right-click the solid rectangle to open the shape tool menu.
steps.description: Pressing the U U key will also open up the shape tool. The icon will be indented or highlighted on the left menu bar once the tool is active.

steps.headline: Set the shape to Polygon Tool from the menu.
steps.description: Polygon is listed on the small menu that popped up from right-clicking the Shape Tool.

Making Triangles with the Shape Tool Open Photoshop. The icon is a blue square with "PS" in the middle. Click File. It is located in the top-left corner of the window. Select New and then Ok to start a new canvas. You can also use an old canvas by double-clicking your saved photoshop file. Select the solid Rectangle button from the menu on the left. It is typically located between the black arrow and the hand icon. Right-click the solid rectangle to open the shape tool menu. Pressing the U U key will also open up the shape tool. The icon will be indented or highlighted on the left menu bar once the tool is active. Set the shape to Polygon Tool from the menu. Polygon is listed on the small menu that popped up from right-clicking the Shape Tool. Making Triangles with the Pen Tool Open up Photoshop. The icon looks like a blue square with "PS" in the center. Click File. Its located in the top-left corner. Select New and then Ok to begin a new canvas. You can also use an old canvas by double-clicking your saved photoshop file. Select the pen tool. This tool has a pen tip as an icon on the left menu. It can also be used via a shortcut by pressing P. Click on a point on the canvas where you want to start your triangle. It will leave a small solid square behind. Click on the canvas where the first side will end. Click on the canvas where the second side will end. Click on the hollow square where you made the first point. Photoshop will usually connect the dots automatically to form a triangle, but if it doesn't, this should fill the triangle. Click on the Move Tool to finish your triangle.
